channel.title: How do u join servers lol
channel.description: im new to this so where do u enter the server name and port and other stuff that i need to play on servers

item.title: How do u join servers lol
item.dc:creator: @ownage-2007 ownage-2007
item.description:
@ownage-2007 wrote:

in moparscape 3.2 client click file then new IP or something similar and enter the server IP
and then go back to file and click new port but unless the server states that they have a different port you dont need to put anything in here. This is because most servers use the default port 43594

Read full topic
item.source: How do u join servers lol

item.title: How do u join servers lol
item.dc:creator: @justlikers justlikers
item.description:
@justlikers wrote:

on the corner under help on moparscape client klick “server status”

Read full topic
